subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Highly Effective Professionals - Traits and Habits
headline: Learn to manage businesses effectively by becoming an exceptional leader in this free online leadership course.
description: This comprehensive course on leadership skills is specially designed for individuals looking to develop leadership qualities and improve their people skills. We present this information concisely, discussing the various traits that are part of a leader's personality and how adding these attributes to one's character brings benefits in life. Furthermore, we address the importance of improving communication skills and mental strength.
courseDescription:
Many people are born to lead and they set an example that inspires others to become just like them. What does becoming a strong leader demand? This journey takes a lot of effort but the result is worth it in the end. It requires one to polish their personality and communication skills to motivate and uplift the morale of their people for their betterment. Another vital skill that every leader should possess is coping with any crises they encounter. Though some people are born with these qualities, others have to work far more to develop these essential traits. Worldwide, corporate organisations keep looking for people who possess these traits. Therefore, it is necessary to develop these attributes if one wants to become a highly effective leader in the future.

Keeping these facts in mind, experts at ExoExcellence Consultants partnered with Alison to develop this comprehensive and straightforward course inspired by Stephen Covey's world-renowned book ‘The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People’. In his book, Covey mentions some essential qualities and traits that must be present in people willing to bring out positive changes in their personalities. We explore these characteristics because a leader must possess them. We also study another famous book, ‘13 Things Mentally Strong People Don't Do’, written by the renowned psychotherapist Amy Morin. How can you improve your mental strength? Morin's book stresses some factors that must be present in a mentally strong person and anyone wanting to become a leader. We have divided this course into two comprehensive modules. The first module discusses various traits that are a fundamental part of the human personality. You will explore the factors that affect an individual's character and the elements that are part of the personality of an effective leader. We stress three essential qualities present in a mentally strong person. The second module contains excerpts from Morin's and Covey's books and discusses the importance of improving personal development and communication skills. 

Anyone aspiring to become a leader must develop these qualities within themselves. At the end of this course, we have prepared an assessment to test the knowledge that allows you to apply for an Alison certificate. Becoming a leader may seem impossible to attain but this course offers you the opportunity to learn and work on these traits, thus enhancing your people skills. Acquiring this knowledge will bring out many positive effects in anyone wanting to achieve professional effectiveness. In addition, anyone looking to improve their work efficiency either in their business or at work will bring significant benefits at a personal and professional level. So why wait to improve your self-worth? Instead, equip yourself with this knowledge in professional traits and habits and begin to enjoy the benefits of becoming a highly influential professional.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Define personality and its various traits.
    • Analyze four different types of personalities in the light of various developmental theories. 
    • Identify different types of personalities according to personality trait theories.
    • Discuss the factors affecting an individual's personality.
    • Explain two of the most important child-rearing practices.
    • Evaluate leadership and some important traits that should be present in a leader.
    • Recognize the importance of a leader with a strong personality. 

  • What is Personality?

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • The word personality derives itself from the Latin word persona. The word persona refers to a mask worn by the theatrical performers through which they either projected different roles or disguised their identities.

  • Definition of Personality

  • The most basic definition of personality is “the characteristic pattern of thoughts, feelings, and behaviors that make a person unique.” Experts believe that a person's personality arises from within the person and remains consistent throughout his lifetime.

  • What is Leadership?

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • Leadership is the ability to guide individuals, teams, or organizations to attain their aims and objectives. Good leadership helps maximize efficiency and aids in achieving strategic and organizational goals. A leader needs to motivate and guide his team while building morale and improving the work environment
  • Effective leadership is the result of a combination of leadership traits or skills. These leadership traits or skills are the personal qualities that define a leader's effectiveness. Some of these effective leadership traits are:
    • New Tab
    • Sense of Accountability 
    • Effective Communicators 
    • Enter your text here..
      Enter your text here..
      Customer ID
      Customer Name
    • Good leaders always take responsibility for their actions and consider themselves accountable for everything they do. They support individuals and at the same time, show compliance to the organization, rules, laws, policies, and structure.
      Good leaders always take responsibility for their actions and consider themselves accountable for everything they do. They support individuals and, at the same time, show compliance to the organization, rules, laws, policies, and structure.
      Customer ID
      Customer Name
    • Good leaders are effective communicators. They are able to explain the problems clearly and also suggest their solutions. They know when they should talk and when they should listen. Good leaders also know to communicate effectively on different channels, such as through phone, emails, or one-on-one, etc.
      Good leaders are effective communicators. They can explain the problems clearly and also suggest their solutions. They know when they should talk and when they should listen.     • Sense of Accountability 
      Good leaders always take responsibility for their actions and consider themselves accountable for everything they do. They support individuals and at the same time, show compliance to the organization, rules, laws, policies, and structure.

  • Lesson Summary

  • Traits of Personality
    • Consistency 
    • Different traits
    • Behaviors
    • Various expressions
  • Different Forms of Personality
    • Type A personality: These people have the tendencies of being a perfectionist
    • Type B personality: These people are flexible and even-tempered
    • Type C personality: People with type C personalities are diligent, and usually struggle while expressing their emotions
    • Type D personality: These people are usually introverts who have constant feelings of worry, sadness, pessimism, and irritation

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Describe mental strength and the factors that determine it.
    • Discuss the three bases of mental strength shortly.
    • Identify and discuss three of the most important traits that must be present in an organizational leader in detail.
    • Analyze the habits necessary for enhancing personal development.
    • Recognize the six paradigms of human interaction. 
    • Explain how one can achieve a win-win situation as an organizational leader.
    • Define why a leader should understand someone before being understood.
    • Evaluate the process of creating synergy in an organization.

  • Mental Strength and Organizational Leader

  • Select an Image from the Gallery

  • An organizational leader needs to be mentally strong. An emotionally unstable and weak person can never become a successful leader. On the other hand, by possessing physical and mental strength, one can easily ensure that his organization reaches the pinnacle of corporate success.

  • What is Mental Strength?

  • When one is on the path of developing his mental strength, he is improving his ability of emotional regulation, thought management, and maintaining a positive attitude regardless of his circumstances.
